body.name: BELLA One Scoop One Cup Coffee Maker, Single Serve Brewer with Adjustable Drip Tray and Permanent Filter, Dishwasher Safe, Stainless Steel and Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: VERSATILE BREWING - BELLA'S single cup coffee maker features a dishwasher safe permanent filter that not only lets you brew delicious coffee but also hot water for tea, chocolate, oatmeal & more. Enjoy a variety of beverages with just one appliance.Filter type:Permanent Filter

LARGE CAPACITY - Our coffee machines are perfect for busy mornings when time is of the essence. With a 14-oz water tank, our single serve coffee maker is perfect for brewing full mugs for the whole family without having to refill often

EFFICIENT AND DELICIOUS - Enjoy a robust and fragrant beverage with our simple one touch operation. The streamlined pumping system of the coffee machine ensures fast and easy brewing, so you can have a great cup of coffee in minutes with minimal cleanup

PERFECT FOR EVERY CUP - The drip tray of our small coffee makers can be adjusted to accomodate cups of any size, including travel sized and personal mugs. This will prevent spillage and allow you to bring your coffee anywhere you go

COMPACT DESIGN - The BELLA coffee maker has a sleek design that won't clutter your countertop, making it perfect for smaller kitchens, office, studios, and dorms. It also makes a great gift for any coffee lover who enjoys modern and stylish appliances
body.description: With it's compact design and sleekish design, the BELLA One Scoop One Cup coffee and tea maker will be your best friend in the mornings. Operation is simpe. Just add your favorite ground coffee or loose leaf tea, press the button and in minutes you will be enjoying a perfect cup of bold coffee or tea. The adjustable height drip tray accommodates a variety of mugs and travel tumblers, so you can enjoy your coffee at home or on-the-go! Additionally, brew hot water for a variety of every day needs such as oatmeal, instant soups, hot cocoa and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little coffee maker.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this both in my office to make coffee, as well as in my traveling van. I can’t say enough good things about it. The first unit lasted about 8 years, and I’ve just bought a replacement when the first slowed down. It consumes about 600 watts, and the heating element shuts down automatically when the water is used up. Some reviewers have mentioned their concerns about no automatic shut off. I’ve tested this unit with a watt meter, and though the light stays on, the heating element definitely turns off. It makes a good cup of drip coffee, without the need for a k-cup or disposable filter. I carry a small container for the used grounds which I compost, so this makes coffee on the road with no waste in the landfill. It can also make tea or hot chocolate. It takes about 3 minutes to make a cup of coffee, and can handle up to about 14 ounces. This coffee maker is a terrific value. It’s well made, works simply and efficiently, and lasts years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic brew, machine lasts long if you treat it right
reviews.reviewText: I waited four months before reviewing this because of some complaints about this coffee maker not lasting long. But the directions on the machine are very, very clear: turn it off when it is done brewing, and unplug it. I don't know why unplugging it matters - that doesn't make much sense, but I do it anyway. My suspicion is that the heating element fails if you keep the machine on after it is done brewing, SO TURN IT OFF and I think you'll be fine.And I mean, turn it off immediately after it is done brewing. If you're the type of person who is going to brew a cup and disappear for awhile, then, if I'm understanding the directions and other reviews correctly, you'll be disappointed. So just wait a few minutes for it to brew. It only takes a couple minutes. Then turn it off.Did I mention you should turn this thing off? Instead of complaining about it not working after you don't?As for the coffee brew itself? It's great. The filter is perfectly shaped and the filter holes are perfectly sized. It's easy to clean, too. Super easy to use. The brew is excellent, actually as good a coffee as I've had from any machine. For 20 bucks, I'd probably use this in place of any larger machine even if I needed a larger one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great when it works but has a short life - worthless warranty
reviews.reviewText: I first ordered this coffee maker because of the great reviews and cost. It does make good coffee and is easy to use but our first one died after 3 months. We tried to do a warranty claim though the company but forget it... their customer service bites. After at least a dozen emails and multiple request for videos of a non-functioning DOA unit (every time we sent a video there was some reason it was not correct???) we gave up after a month correspondence. The time we spent on this was not worth the price f the coffee maker. Against my better judgement my wife ordered a 2nd one when it was on sale. Since the unit does not have an auto off function I thought maybe my wife had left it on too long. Because of this I bought a timer switch that automatically turns off after 5 minutes thinking that this would avoid the issue on our second unit. That unit also failed after a few months. The timer switch I bought did not solve anything. Unless you want a paper weight that looks like a cheap coffee maker avoid this like the plague. The warranty is worthless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for cup of coffee or tea
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to have a single cup of coffee, tea, or hot chocolate before work or bed and it works great. The water is hot enough and only takes a couple of minutes. The brew basket is well designed to make a good cup of coffee and can be removed for just a hot cup of water with no splashing or overfill. I do wish it were taller so my travel mugs would fit but then I usually use it for a large cup which works great. Recommend it for any who want a single cup of coffee or hot water when in a hurry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use and convenient
reviews.reviewText: I love this little coffee maker, it doesn’t take up alotta space, its easy to use and clean. I love the ease of the disposable filter. It brews pretty quickly within 3-4 minutes. You can also use it to make tea, instant soups and oatmeal as well w just making hot water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars LOVED MY LAST ONE, HOWEVER, THIS NEW ONE HAS QUIT USING LESS THAN 2 MONTHS!
reviews.reviewText: I HAVE HAD A BELLA PRIOR TO THIS ONE AND LOVED IT. AFTER SEVERAL YEARS, IT QUIT SO WE ORDERED THIS NEW ONE IS OCTOBER. IT HAS ALREADY QUIT WORKING! VERY DISAPPOINTED! THE OLD ONE LASTED ME SEVERAL YEARS AND THIS ONE DIDN’T LAST TWO MONTHS!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great one cup coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact it doesn't take up a lot of counter space it has a built in filter and it's great for making single serve cups of coffee. You can use a cup or a thermal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was perfect for me. I use a 16oz ball glass jar to fill the reservoir and then use it as my container/coffee cup to catch and drink the coffee. I use 1 level scoop of ground coffee which is equivalent to 3TB. Be sure to shut off after each brew and all ow the coffee maker to cool down before disposing grounds. No muss or fuss, brews a great cup of coffee!
Funciona bien.Un poco frágil.Incómoda para limpiar.

This machine had saved me time and money. I’m the only one drinking coffee at Home. All the machines I was able to find were a 3-cup minimum machines. They were costing me a lot of wasted coffee.It’s a easy to use and clean.I’ve been using 1-2 cups daily. Highly recommended.
Did not work after 2 uses. Water came out of the bottom of the unit where the cord is. Fire hazard.

reviews.reviewTitle: Makes a godd cup of coffee
reviews.reviewText: Thank you for great service and product.
Es una cafetera moderna y bonita a buen precio, solo que al usarla no es practica para limpiar, ya que el depósito del café se desborda al recipiente del agua, así pongas poco café al depósito.
